description: a cross-linked polymer
name: thermoset

description: a polymer that becomes pliable at elevated temperature adn solidifies upon cooling to room temperature
name: thermoplastic

description: a polymer that does exhibit some crystalline structure
name: semicrystalline

description: a cross-linked polymer with a glass transition well below room temperature
name: elastomer

description: a polymer that does not exhibit any crystalline structure
name: amorphous

description: a polymer with a single repeating structure
name: homopolymer

description: a polymer with a two or more repeating structures
name: copolymer

description: a polymer with a two or more repeating structures are randomly distributed
name: random

description: a polymer with a two or more repeating structures are distributed in groups
name: block

description: a polymer where the composition oscillates between two repeating structures
name: alternating

description: a polymer where the composition gradually transitions from one repeating structure into another
name: gradient

description: a polymer with all substituent having the same stereoconfiguration
name: isotactic

description: a polymer with substituent alternating stereoconfiguration
name: syndiotactic

description: a polymer with substituent having a random distribution of stereoconfiguration
name: atactic

description: a polymer with one positional isomer; all head-to-tail or tail-to-tail and head-to-head
name: regio_regular

description: a polymer with more than one positional isomer; mixture of head-to-tail, tail-to-tail, and head-to-head
name: regio_irregular

description: a polymer with a single line of repeat units
name: linear

description: a polymer with 3 or more arms originating from a single point
name: star

description: a polymer with no ends or a loop of repeat units
name: ring

description: a polymer with a main chain with small chains branching off the main chain
name: comb

description: a polymer with a very high density of chains branching off the main linear chain
name: bottlebrush

description: a polymer with a very high degree of branches and branches have more branching
name: hyperbranch

description: a polymer with a where a molecular structure percolates through the full macroscopic sample
name: network

description: a polymer with delocalized electrons in the p orbital along the backbone
name: conjugated_poly

description: a material with two or more composed of two or more polymers
name: polymer_blend

description: a polymer with [$]CC(R)[$] structure and the locally surrounding is C and H
name: polyolefins

description: a polymer with [$]CC(c1ccccc1)[$] structure
name: polystyrenes

description: a polymer with [$]c1cccc(c1)[$] structure
name: polyphenylenes

description: a polymer with [$]CC(R)[$] structure and the locally surrounding by elements other than C and H
name: polyvinyls

description: a polymer with [$]CC(C(=O)O-R)[$] structure
name: polyacrylates

description: a polymer with [$]CC(C)(C(=O)O-R)[$] structure
name: polymethacrylates

description: a polymer with [$]CC(OR)[$] structure
name: polyvinyl_ethers

description: a polymer with [$]CC(OC(=O)-R)[$] structure
name: polyvinyl_esters

description: a polymer with R-C(=O)O-R within the backbone
name: polyesters

description: a polymer with R-O-C(=O)O-R within the backbone
name: polycarbonates

description: a polymer with R-O-R within the backbone
name: polyethers

description: a polymer with R-C(=O)-O-C(=O)-R within the backbone
name: polyanydrides

description: a polymer with R-C(=O)-R with the backbone
name: polyketones

description: a polymer with R-N(R)-R within the backbone
name: polyamines

description: a polymer with R-N(R)-C(=O)O-R within the backbone
name: polyurethanes

description: a polymer with R-C(=O)N(R)-R within the backbone
name: polyamides

description: a polymer with R-N(R)-C(=O)-N(R)-R within the backbone
name: polyureas

description: a polymer with R-Si(R)(R)-R within the backbone
name: silicones

description: a polymer with R-S-R within the backbone
name: polysulfides

description: a polymer with R-S(=O)(=O)-R within the backbone
name: polysulfones

description: a polymer with R-S(=O)-R within the backbone
name: polysulfoxides

description: a polymer with C=C1=CC=CS1 5 member ring within the backbone
name: polythiophenes

description: a polymer with R-P(R)(R)=N-R within the backbone
name: polyphosphazenes

description: a chemical with one double bond and is locally surrounded by only C and H
name: olefin

description: a chemical with two or more double bonds
name: diene

description: a chemical with C=C-(c1ccccc1) structure
name: styrene

description: a chemical where at least one double bond is found in a ring (excluding aromatic rings)
name: cyclic_olefin

description: a chemical with one or more triple bounds (C≡C)
name: acetylene

description: a chemical with C=C-R structure and the local surrounding contains elements other than C and H
name: vinyl

description: a chemical with C=C-O-R structure
name: vinyl_ether

description: a chemical with C=C-O-(C=O)-R structure
name: vinyl_ester

description: a chemical with C=C-C(=O)O-R structure
name: acrylate

description: a chemical with C=C(C)-C(=O)O-R structure
name: methylacrylate

description: (cyclic ester) a chemical with R-C(=O)O-R within a ring
name: lactone

description: a chemical with R-O-R within a ring
name: cyclic_ether

description: a chemical with R-O-C(=O)O-R within a ring
name: cyclic_carbonate

description: a chemical with R-C(=O)-O-C(=O)-R with a ring (includes N-carboxy anhydrides)
name: cyclic_anhydride

description: a chemical with a R-N=C(R)-O-R within a five membered ring
name: oxazoline

description: (cyclic amide) a chemical with R-C(=O)N(R)-R within a ring
name: lactam

description: a chemical with R-N(R)-R within a ring
name: cyclic_amine

description: a chemical with R-S-R or R-S(=O)-R within a ring
name: cyclic_sulfur

description: a chemical with C=C1=CC=CS1 5 member ring
name: thiophene

description: a chemical with R-O-P(=O)(OR)-O-R within a ring
name: phosphoesters

description: a chemical with R-O-P(=O)(C(R)(R)R)-O-R within a ring
name: phosphonate

description: a chemical with R-P(=O)(R)-O-R within a ring
name: phostone

description: a chemical with R-P(R)(R)=N-R within a ring
name: phosphazenes

description: a chemical with R-O-Si(R)(R)-O-R within a ring
name: siloxane

description: a chemical with R-Si(R)(R)-R within a ring
name: carbosiloxane

description: a chemical with two or more -OH groups
name: diol

description: a chemical with two or more -C(=O)OH groups
name: dicarboxylic_acid

description: a chemical with two or more -NH2 groups
name: diamines

description: a chemical containing at least one metal atom and non-metal atom
name: organometallic

description: a chemical with two or more -COCl groups
name: diacid chloride

description: a chemical lacking carbon-hydrogen bonds
name: inorganic

description: a material with two or more components
name: composite

description: a sequence of amino acids
name: protein

description: living organism
name: cell

description: a protein connected to a synthetic polymer
name: polymer_protein

description: a chemical made of primarily carbon and hydrogen atoms,and may include any other elements (e.g., nitrogen, oxygen, halogens, phosphorus, silicon, sulfur).
name: organic
